Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I bet I'd look awesome with a few gold chains,
or a sovereign ring. If I could afford it, that is.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I really want to deck myself out with some
silver jewelry, you know? I'd be sure to get some
respect around here. Too bad about the price...

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
This place is real stylish. The perfect date spot
for me and my girlfriend...that I don't have...

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
When it gets hot, I should bring my girlfriend
here to cool off. She'll like that.
<PAGE>
I mean, I'm assuming she will. Seeing as I
haven't met her yet.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
Oh wow, this bench is so flashy... Who built it,
some rich guy?

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I want to bring some cute girl here and talk
about love.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
Of all the things you could've put here as a
decoration, a hay bale? ...No, I like it. It's kinda
stylish, in its own way.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I'd love a nice cobblestone path in front of my
house. Ah, if I were a rich man...

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
You know what girls like? Bricks. No, really; all
the girls I know love brick stuff. Maybe I should
start a brick collection or something.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
Erm, where's the inn? Oh...is this just a
decoration?

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I really want to bring a cute girl out to this plaza
someday. Dreams do come true, right?

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I feel like I'm in a cool city!

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
Me, I don't know a daisy from a dandelion, but
girls love flowers, don't they?

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
This'd make a nice present for a girl I like...if I
could ever get it all the way home.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
Drat! I wanted to talk to Lillie, but some random
dude got in the way.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I talked to Agate, and she almost took me to the
safari. But I don't like animals...

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I talked to Iris, but she brushed me off...
<PAGE>
She didn't even know I'd bought an antique at
her brother's store...

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I tried to hit on Angela, but she gave me this
frosty look...
<PAGE>
Still, I got a rush just catching a glimpse of that
blizzard behind her eyes...

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
Shhh... I'm trying to blend in here while I scout
out the ladies.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
Even while I'm shopping, my eyes are always on
the lookout for cute girls.

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I came here to see Lillie. That cute weathergirl,
you know? Where is she? ♪

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I was so crazy about Lillie that I almost didn't
notice Agate. She's good looking too, isn't she?

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
I met this smart, beautiful, curvaceous young
lady just a little while ago! She must be my
angel!

<NAME_MOB_JOHN>
The other day, I passed out and got taken to the
clinic...
<PAGE>
And that's where I found my soulmate!
<PAGE>
Oh, sweet Angela... I swear she came down
from Heaven just for me!
